main_definition: A surname or a brand name associated with Coleman products, which are outdoor recreational equipment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Surname of an individual originating from England.
meanings_and_examples.example: John Coleman is the owner of a small business.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A brand name associated with outdoor recreational products like tents, coolers and portable camping stoves.
meanings_and_examples.example: The Coleman tent provided shelter during our weekend camping trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in a colloquial sense to refer to someone who enjoys outdoor activities or is an adventurer.
meanings_and_examples.example: As a true Coleman, he loves spending his free time hiking and camping.
